Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Provides that any train operating without a conductor is prohibited from passing under any body of water
Summary: Provides that any train operating without a conductor is prohibited from passing under any body of water.
LawCode: Add ยง1277-b, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the prohibition of the use of passenger trains without conductors in certain circumstances
